title: Mechanised mining at BHP's Burwood mine
creator_credit: Cinesound and Broken Hill Proprietary Company
brief_description: Description of methods of mining used at the Burwood mine of BHP, showing how hand-mining has been largely replaced bymechanised methods. Training schemes in the use of modern equipment are illustrated and amenities at the time are shown.
